alert.note: Alert for Fannin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 7:31PM CST until March 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMAR AND EAST CENTRAL FANNIN COUNTIES... At 730 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Crockett Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Sumner around 745 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Forest Hill, Petty, Globe, Brookston, Tigertown, Allens Point and Allens Chapel. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
